FAQ.title: Frequently Asked Questions
FAQ.subtitle: Find Answers
FAQ.question_1: What types of robotics solutions does Rolitt offer?
FAQ.answer_1: Rolitt offers a wide range of robotics solutions including industrial automation systems, healthcare assistance robots, educational robotics platforms, and home automation solutions. Each product line is designed to address specific needs in different sectors while leveraging our core AI and robotics technologies.
FAQ.question_2: How can I integrate Rolitt's technology with my existing systems?
FAQ.answer_2: Our solutions are designed with interoperability in mind. We provide comprehensive APIs, documentation, and integration support to ensure seamless connection with your existing infrastructure. Our technical team works closely with clients during implementation to ensure successful integration and minimal disruption.
FAQ.question_3: What kind of support does Rolitt provide after purchase?
FAQ.answer_3: We offer comprehensive post-purchase support including technical assistance, maintenance services, software updates, and training programs. Our support packages can be tailored to your specific needs, from basic troubleshooting to full-service maintenance contracts with guaranteed response times.
FAQ.question_4: Is Rolitt's technology suitable for small businesses?
FAQ.answer_4: Absolutely! We have solutions designed for organizations of all sizes. For small businesses, we offer scalable options that provide advanced capabilities without requiring extensive infrastructure or technical expertise. Our modular approach allows you to start small and expand as your needs grow.
FAQ.question_5: How does Rolitt ensure the security of its robotic systems?
FAQ.answer_5: Security is a top priority at Rolitt. We implement multiple layers of protection including encrypted communications, secure authentication protocols, regular security updates, and comprehensive vulnerability testing. Our systems are designed with privacy-by-design principles and comply with relevant industry standards and regulations.
FAQ.question_6: What makes Rolitt's technology different from competitors?
FAQ.answer_6: Our key differentiator is our proprietary AI technology that enables more adaptive, intelligent behavior in our robotic systems. Additionally, we focus on user-friendly interfaces, seamless integration capabilities, and robust security features. Our solutions are developed with extensive real-world testing to ensure reliability and performance in diverse environments.

Timeline.meta_title: Our Company Timeline | Key Milestones and Events
Timeline.meta_description: Explore the journey of our company through key milestones and events that have shaped our history and vision for the future.
Timeline.title: Our Journey
Timeline.description: Discover the key moments that have defined our path and shaped our vision for the future.

event1.title: The Beginning of an Idea
event1.description: Founder AVIVA bought a talking toy for his 4-year-old daughter. While it looked cute, he felt it was just a plastic toy. Inspired by his experience in the internet industry, AVIVA decided to create an AI-powered robotic toy.

event2.title: Forming the Core Team
event2.description: AVIVA recognized the challenges of creating such an innovative product. He interviewed many industry experts and assembled a passionate team. They began developing the Rolitt product in a borrowed office space.

event3.title: Product Development and Iteration
event3.description: The team worked tirelessly, iterating on the product design and functionality. They focused on creating a companion that was not only intelligent but also emotionally resonant. This phase involved extensive research, prototyping, and user feedback sessions to refine the user experience.

event4.title: Securing Key Partnerships
event4.description: We successfully partnered with leading AI technology providers and manufacturing companies to ensure that Rolitt is built with the highest quality components and cutting-edge technology. These partnerships are crucial for our production and innovation capabilities.

event5.title: Pre-launch and Community Building
event5.description: We launched our pre-order campaign and began building a community of early adopters. The response was overwhelmingly positive, with thousands of people expressing interest in Rolitt. This early support has been instrumental in validating our vision and motivating our team.

event6.title: The Future of Rolitt
event6.description: We are committed to continuous innovation and improvement. Our roadmap includes expanding Rolitt's capabilities, introducing new features, and exploring new applications for our technology. We believe that Rolitt is just the beginning of a new era of human-robot interaction.

About.meta_title: About Rolitt | Our Story and Mission
About.meta_description: Learn more about Rolitt, our mission, vision, and the team behind our innovative AI companion.
About.title: About Rolitt
About.subtitle: We create AI companions that build emotional connections and enrich lives
About.mission_description: Our mission is simple yet ambitious: to bridge the gap between technology and the human spirit. At Rolitt, we believe technology should feel personal and meaningful. We're building smart companions—whether through our interactive robots or wearable devices like our smart ring—that enrich people's lives in deeply personal ways, bringing a sense of companionship, empowerment, and delight to every moment.
About.story_description: Rolitt was born from a desire to create something more than just functional technology. As a team of engineers, designers, and dreamers, we wanted to go beyond the typical boundaries of tech and design something that truly connects with people. It all started with our companion robot, crafted to offer warmth, understanding, and a friendly presence in people's daily lives.
About.approach_description: At Rolitt, our approach is simple: make technology that resonates with people. Every product we design starts with a question: How can we make this feel more human? From intelligent wearables that support your daily rhythm to AI-powered devices that engage with genuine warmth, we're dedicated to building smart hardware that brings joy, ease, and meaning to the everyday.
About.approach_description2: We believe that technology shouldn't be just a tool—it should be a companion. By focusing on thoughtful design, advanced AI, and intuitive interactions, we're creating a new category of devices that bridge the gap between utility and humanity. Rolitt isn't just about innovation; it's about creating experiences that you can rely on, connect with, and take with you wherever life leads.
About.value1_description: We strive to push the boundaries of what AI can accomplish by continuously exploring and implementing new technologies.
About.value2_description: We design our AI companions with a deep understanding of human emotions and needs to provide genuine emotional support.
About.value3_description: We are committed to making our technology accessible and usable for people of all ages and abilities.
About.team_description: Our diverse team brings together experts in artificial intelligence, robotics, psychology, and design to create AI companions that are both technologically advanced and humanly engaging.
About.member1_bio: As founder and CEO, Anna brings over 15 years of experience in AI and robotics. Her vision of emotional AI drives Rolitt forward.
About.member2_bio: As CTO, Michael leads the technical development of Rolitt, ensuring our AI systems are both innovative and reliable.
About.member3_bio: As Head of Research, Sofia combines her expertise in psychology and AI to enhance the emotional intelligence of Rolitt.
